attributes.action: Continue to allow families access to outdoor Tennis courts during lockdown.
attributes.additional_details: Given the importance of exercise both physically and mentally for all ages.  And given the fact that families are able to exercise outside together, there is no logical reason that they should not be allowed to have access to outdoor tennis courts.  Please allow access to outdoor tennis courts to continue during lockdown.
attributes.background: Allow access for families to continue to use outdoor Tennis courts during lockdown.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Allow indoor/outdoor tennis courts to operate under strict distancing protocols: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557428

Exempt outdoor tennis from closure due to COVID-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557658
